feature.description: Large objects are now 64-bit and can now be up to 4TB where before it …

feature.name: Custom background workers
feature.description: Background worker processes can now be added that can attach to PostgreSQL's shared memory.

feature.name: Disk based FSM
feature.description: replaces the shared memory fixed size free space map with an on-disk implemenation

feature.name: Dynamic Background Workers
feature.description: Allows background workers to be started and stopped dynamically by any user process.

feature.name: EXPLAIN (BUFFERS) support
feature.description: adds the ability to show buffer-usage statistics for a query

feature.name: EXPLAIN (MEMORY)
feature.description: The `EXPLAIN` option `MEMORY` reports optimizer memory usage .

feature.name: EXPLAIN (SERIALIZE) support
feature.description: The `EXPLAIN` option `SERIALIZE` reports the cost of converting data for network transmission.

feature.name: EXPLAIN (WAL) support
feature.description: [EXPLAIN](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/sql-explain.html) can now track WAL usage information along with [auto_explain](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/auto-explain.html), [autovacuum](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/routine-vacuuming.html#AUTOVACUUM), and [pg_stat_statements](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/pgstatstatements.html). For more …

feature.name: "jsonlog" logging format

feature.name: Server statistics in shared memory
feature.description: [Server-level statistics](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html) are stored in shared memory. This eliminates the separate statistics collector process.

feature.description: Previously sizing shared memory often required adjusting kernel parameters to accommodate the change. This is …

feature.description: Adds XML, JSON and YAML output to EXPLAIN to help with automatic processing of plans

feature.name: Arrays of compound types
feature.description: allows the creation of arrays of arbitrary complex compound types

feature.name: NULLs in Array
feature.description: array elements can contain NULL

feature.description: Fulltext search for phrases and word proximity.

feature.description: A serial data type that uses smallint (2 byte integer) as its base type, giving …

feature.description: Allows additional columns to be included in as "non-key" columns in a GiST index, and …

feature.name: Exclusion constraints

feature.description: GIN Indexes now take up significantly less space and perform a lot faster than pre-9.4 …

feature.description: B-tree index pages can be searched by separate parallel workers.
